item.title: GoodbyeX
item.author: blusewill
item.description:
Recently I made a article about X Be Gone

Which I talking about some issues they have to fix.

But Recently I found out that GoodbyeX is a Better alternative to X Be Gone

Installation

Last time I talk about you have to install manually through source on X Be Gone but GoodbyeX have a Chrome Web Store Page that you just only have to click once and forgot forever

Chrome

https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/goodbyex/cafaialogfdbacbbhgjohmkocpkcnfjf

Firefox

https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/goodbyex

Why use GoodbyeX?

Last time when I am talking about some issues about X Be Gone’s issues. One of them actually fixed in this Extension

They Fixed Load Screen Problem Which you won’t see X when you load in Twitter.

Same issues

  1. They Haven’t Fix the TweetDeck Problem of XPro and X favicon of it.
  2. When you Switch Account the logo will revert back (X Be Gone also have this Problem)
  3. It won’t replace the X in popup window

But All of these things can be resolved in Future Update And I see GoodbyeX has more active development than X Be Gone

So whatever which project do you like Go Ahead and Check them out!

item.title: X Be Gone
item.author: blusewill
item.description:
So Twitter have their New logo and Name Called “X”

The vision for X has been unfolding over the last 9 months – and there’s so much more on the horizon. Today we’re taking a moment to celebrate the progress and thank our teams and all our partners. https://t.co/azXPbe8IpO

— X (@X) August 2, 2023

In this website Article I am going to show you how can you change it from “X” to Twitter

Installation

Here is the installation of the extension

Firefox

Firefox User is probably the most easiest one which you have to do is go to Firefox Add-on and install this Extension after the Installation go to twitter and you should see it switch to twitter instead of X

Chromium Based Browser

So if you are using Chrome/Brave that is based on Chromium you have to install manually through the Source

Click on < > Code and Download zip and Extracted into a Folder

Now go to Extension Tab by typing chrome://extensions in the URL bar

And you will see Developer Mode on the Top Right Corner, Enable it.

Click Load Unpacked on the left and open the Extracted Folder

And you should have revert back to the original twitter instead of “X”

Issues about this Extension

Well there is still something needs to be fixed in this extension

like it won’t replace the X on TweetDeck, and the loading screen will still show X

but is better then having it all to be X

Now having fun to have that Bird Back!
